Package tatami.simulation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AgentLoader
    The agent loader is the interface to an instance that uses existing scenario information to completely specify loading information for an agent.
    AgentManager
    An instance implementing this interface is a wrapper to an actual agent instance (that may be not yet created).
    PlatformLoader
    The platform loader is the interface to the manager of an agent platform.
    PlatformLoader.PlatformLink
    This interface should be implemented by classes facilitating the link between an agent and a platform (e.g.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentCreationData
    Class containing the data for the creation of an agent.
    Boot
    The Boot singleton class manages the startup of the multi-agent system.
    BootDefaultArguments
    This class traditionally contains settings for simulations, in order to decouple it from Boot (making it easy to ignore changes in BootSettings when committing).
    BootSettingsManager
    This class manages settings for simulations.
    ClaimUtils
    The purpose of this class is to hold functions that are necessary for the simulation, but are related to CLAIM agents.
    DefaultPlatform
    THe default platform for running agents.
    LocalDeploymentPlatform  
    LocalDeploymentPlatform.SimpleLocalMessaging
    Simple implementation of MessagingComponent, that uses agents' names as their addresses.
    SimulationAgent
    Agent that handles the simulation.
    SimulationLinkAgent
    In order to be able to communicate with other agents in a platform, the SimulationManager keeps an agent on each of the available platforms, in order to relay events and control messages to the agents.
    SimulationManager
    Singleton class managing the simulation, visualization and agent control on a machine or on a set of machines (possibly all).
    VisualizationManager
    Singleton class managing the visualization and control of agents residing on a machine or on a set of machines (possibly all).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AgentLoader.StandardAgentLoaderType
    Standard types of loaders for agents.
    PlatformLoader.StandardPlatformType
    Standard types of platforms.
    SimulationManager.SimulationComponent
    Components of the simulation manager GUI.
